p: Add DBU drop wise (8.76 mL, 56.92 mmol) to a solution of 2-(4-bromophenyl)phenylamine (3.53 g, 14.23 mmol) in methylene chloride (50ml) at 0°C, followed by isopropylsulfonyl chloride (3.29 mL, 28.46 mmol) also added drop wise and stir the reaction at room temperature for 24 h. Remove solvent under reduce pressure and purify the residue by silica gel chromatography eluting with ethyl acetate:hexane 1:4 to ethyl acetate to provide the title compound (4.93 g, 98%). Mass spectrum (m/e): 355 (M+1); 353 (M-1).
